name: Sam Slapstick and the Littering Problem
name_original: Sam Slapstick and the Littering Problem
description:
Clown Amalgam Reporter Flotsam "Sam" Slapstick hits the scene with another caper. Why on the Trash Heap are there so many darned peels??

This game was created as a part of UCSC's Interactive Narrative course. It was developed in a week, and I did my best to be as improvisational as possible.
